item.title: FDA Extends Roflumilast’s AD Approval to Young Children
item.description: The approval is for children ages 2-5 with mild-to-moderate atopic dermatitis. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Many With Mets Prostate Cancer Not Receiving PARP Inhibitors
item.description: Nearly half of patients with metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer harboring BRCA1/2 alterations do not receive PARP inhibitors, a new study...

item.title: GERD Risk Higher With GLP-1s vs SGLT2s
item.description: New findings highlight a potential trade-off between the benefits of GLP-1 therapy and GI risks. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Fermentable Fiber May Lower Crohn’s Disease Risk

item.title: When Tumors Vanish: The Mystery of Spontaneous Regression
